entry.title: 选择排序（Python）
entry.content:
<pre class="prettyprint linenums bush:python" lang="python">#! /usr/bin/env python

coding: utf-8

def select_sort(arraylist):

for i in range(0, len(arraylist)):
    minElement = i
    for j in range(i, len(arraylist)):
        if arraylist[j] < arraylist[minElement]:
            minElement = j
    temp = arraylist[i]
    arraylist[i] = arraylist[minElement]
    arraylist[minElement] = temp

if name == "main":

arr = [2, 424, 4, 13, 5, 99, 100, 231, 0, 1]
print arr
select_sort(arr)
print arr
